0x7CCE1163.name: GET_PED_DECORATIONS

params.name: ped
params.description: The ped you want to retrieve data for.

0x7CCE1163.description:
Returns a list of decorations applied to a ped.

The data returned adheres to the following layout:

```
[ [ collectionHash1, overlayHash1 ], ..., [c ollectionHashN, overlayHashN ] ]
```

This command will return undefined data if invoked on a remote player ped.
0x7CCE1163.resultsDescription: An object containing a list of applied decorations.
